cont.entity_a: Stopped working in less than a year. Problematic in low light. Not suitable for fast-moving sports. Noisy but not bothersome. Has slight lag.
cont.entity_b: Focus can hunt at close range on non-contrasty subjects. Auto-focus is slow but manageable.

cont.entity_a: No way to contact seller for warranty information; lens not eligible for warranty repairs. Warranty repair service was efficient but shipping was at user's expense. Comes with a lens hood and has a 6-year warranty.
Telephoto macro function is appreciated. Macro setting is effective for close-up shots. Macro function is impressive. Macro switch can be tricky to use.
cont.entity_b: Fantastic macro lens for Canon shooters. Manual focus is recommended for macro.

cont.entity_a: Lens is solid and well-built. Lens body is lightweight but solidly built.
cont.entity_b: Extremely heavy, almost unusable handheld. Heavy and slow focusing.

cont.entity_a: Picture quality is good. Sharpness decreases at extreme zoom. Some chromatic aberration present. Pictures are generally soft with chromatic aberration.
cont.entity_b: Extremely sharp and fun to use. High-quality and super sharp photos. Great depth and clarity in photos. Sharpness, saturation, and color accuracy are excellent.

cont.entity_a: Photos can be shaky without a tripod. Not a low-light lens without image stabilization. No vibration reduction as advertised.
cont.entity_b: Handheld macro is difficult. Tripod recommended.

cont.entity_a: Lens is lightweight and inexpensive. Lens is slightly heavy compared to kit lenses.
cont.entity_b: Extremely heavy, almost unusable handheld. Heavy and slow focusing.

cont.entity_a: Lens provides good value for a 70-300mm zoom. Excellent lens for the price. Great bargain for beginners.
cont.entity_b: Worth every penny, especially at Amazon's price. Bargain for the money compared to other top lenses.

cont.entity_a: Great for non-star related photography. Great for macro and distance photography.
cont.entity_b: Good for portraits and macro photography.

cont.entity_a: Focus hunts and can be problematic.
cont.entity_b: Focus can hunt at close range on non-contrasty subjects. Focuses slowly but sharp for close-up portraits.

cont.entity_a: Lens takes excellent pictures even at full telephoto.
Good for beginners due to price and features.
cont.entity_b: Great performance expected from Canon L series.
